parameters: this starts with the most difficult part of the
setup done to read the buttons correctly.
We start to check if the ocarina is buing played,
than we check if the button is being pressed.
This part always runs together when "Use Ocarina"
is active and combine with "Play Ocarina" and
Setup when you play the Ocarina
TEMP SWITCH TO DISABLE ALL MOVEMENT INPUT!
YEP_StopMapMovement  (use if you have the plugin)
Variable "Song = 0" means nothing is played yet,
so it's used as current song placeholder.
the "SongIndex" is checking for the columns,
1 is the first column, 2 is the 2nd column,
you can erase pictures 1 by 1 if you like, usefull
if you have picture used, 1, 4, 6, 22, 23, 25, 29 etc.
after each other, use scriptcall instead.
TEMP SWITCH TO ALLOW ALL MOVEMENT INPUT!
YEP_StopMapMovement  (use if you have the plugin)
For each Song, you use the same setup, BUT there is
a catch, you can show text, but it's recommended to
"song of paths", will light the path or hidden paths
will be reveiled or however you want the effect to be.
Every effect happend where the "text" is or right below
the setup up is need to be copy paste for EACH song
the player can learn inside the game, this demo can do
6 songs, but only 1 setups for test purposes.

starting X position -x to center it again,
while the origin take the upper left corner as 0,0
so it will push the image by "x" pixels to the right.
so we remove those extra pixels so it goes straight
